function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discussion of the status of the spread of COVID-19 using early reported case data from the U.K., the U.S., Spain, and Germany","Impact":"Potential for spreading misinformation or outdated information","Mitigation":"Use updated and verified data sources for analysis","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, general public","Owner":"Researchers, public health institutions"},{"Description":"Discussion of the potential of quarantine measures, hospital isolation measures, and self-protection measures to alleviate the spread of the epidemic","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the effectiveness of interventions without proper context","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive context and limitations of the discussed measures","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data visualization tools","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Researchers, public health institutions"},{"Description":"Evaluation of the effect of hospital isolation measures based on hospital spatiotemporal distribution","Impact":"Potential for misinterpretation of the impact of hospital isolation measures on epidemic control","Mitigation":"Provide detailed methodology and limitations of the evaluation","Technologies":"Spatial analysis tools, data visualization tools","People":"Public health officials, healthcare workers, hospital administrators","Owner":"Researchers, public health institutions"}]}
